channel.title: American Rune's Client
channel.description:
Hi all when i try to open american rune client i get this error:
http://img25.imageshack.us/img25/6591/73581025qu6.jpg
Also i sent my client to a friend he could open it but he cant conect to my server anyone help me ?

item.title: American Rune's Client
item.dc:creator: @SandScape SandScape
item.description:
@SandScape wrote:

[quote=“junior631, post:3, topic:260211”]It happens when i press .run in my client folder. I tryed it with a friend and it worked for him.
I then tryed it on another friend and it didn’t work for him.

So i downloaded a new client - heropkz client v1 and the .run worked and the client worked fine so i thought maybe i can copy the .run into my client but i still had the error :S[/quote]no you cant copy like that

Read full topic

item.title: American Rune's Client
item.dc:creator: @junior631 junior631
item.description:
@junior631 wrote:

It happens when i press .run in my client folder. I tryed it with a friend and it worked for him.
I then tryed it on another friend and it didn’t work for him.

So i downloaded a new client - heropkz client v1 and the .run worked and the client worked fine so i thought maybe i can copy the .run into my client but i still had the error :S

Read full topic

item.title: American Rune's Client
item.dc:creator: @SandScape SandScape
item.description:
@SandScape wrote:

well that happens alot when something goes wrong.for an example like an silabsoft client the screen goes white thats the same as this on clients. just restart the client,

Read full topic
